title: Custom Destination Event Planning & Management - California San Diego Los Angeles San Francisco | CSI DMC
text:
California
Maureen Carter
Senior Vice President, Global Sales +1 719-491-2953 maureen.carter@csi-dmc.com
CSI DMC California
With its miles of beaches, technological ingenuity and world-renowned viticulture, the bounty of attractions available to guests in California has made the state a must-see region for guests of all ages. An incredible destination for guests looking to take part in the bustle of activity of Silicon Valley, the stars of the screen in Hollywood, or the relaxation and eco-friendly innovation of the coastal towns, California has an incredible array of facets to explore. The CSI DMC California team is ready to assist with our local insights on the attractions of each of the state’s distinctive regions, from the world-famous Santa Monica Pier, to the tech-corridor of San Francisco, to the sequoias of Yosemite.
